dialogue.text: Today's one of my favorite events of the month! It's Fanart Showcase day!
I love and cherish every piece of fanwork we get, and I wanna spotlight the amazing viewers who make these amazing things for us!
Today's fanart comes from two lil’ youngsters. Gummy, Age 10, from New Togarashi, and… this handwriting is harder to read…
Saff..? I think that's correct… Age 11, from… The Preheats? Huh, wasn't expecting anyone to know us from over there.
I've been gushing about this one all day. Genuinely the cutest art I've been gifted ever. I even framed it and put it up in my bedroom, eheh.
To show our appreciation, I’m so happy to welcome both Gummy and Saff to the stream today! Syn, would you do the honors of reading their chat messages?
Saff, Gummy, you're now live on my chatbot system! Welcome to the SynSun stream!
GUMMY: Im on the stream! Hi Mama! Hi Papa! Hi Sunny! Hi Syn-Syn! Hi hi internet peoples!!!
saff: hi
Hi! Awwh, I love the energy! So, you two, how did you learn about our stream?
GUMMY: So like I was coming home from school 1 day and Mama and Papa had the BIGGEST smiley faces ever!

GUMMY: I was like 'whats going on?' and they were like 'we just got back from this amazing concert!' and I was like ‘ooooo tell me more!’ so they were like ‘of course sweetie wheel tell you all about it!’ and then
Uhh… maybe cut to the chase a little bit, kid? This section of the stream ain't meant to take very long
GUMMY: Right right! No filler/flashbacks just action! Got it!

GUMMY: I wanted to hear more about those kool musicians that do all the crazy anime power stuff but Mama and Papa dont let me on a lot of websites but they found this one and said it was perfect 4 me!!!

GUMMY: And they were right!!! I watch the stream every day after school and Papa reads all the blogs to me when him and Mama come home from work! Everything I learn gives me so much inspiration 4 my art and comics!
Gosh, you're gonna make me teary-eyed, Gummy. That is so sweet!
Tell your parents how much I appreciate their approval. I try my best to keep this stream and all my blogs accessible for all ages.
Heh, We're happy to be of service! Now, what about you, Saff?
saff: huh
We're asking you the same question now. How did you learn about our stream?
saff: i dont watch this show
You… don't? Didn't you help Gummy make the fanart, though?
saff: do we win a prize
…no? This is just a fanart showcase. Fanart is just for fun, eheh.
GUMMY: IT WAS SO MUCH FUN!!!1
saff: oh
saff: whatevr
Wait… says here that you're from The Preheats, kid. How'd you get all the way over to New Togarashi from there to help make that art?
saff: walked
But… There's an entire ocean between Togarashi Town and The Preheats. I know Sweet has said in interviews before that getting from The Preheats to Enzync tends to be a struggle sometimes, too…
saff: sweet
saff: is she there
saff: put sweet on
Ahah, sorry, Sweet isn't here, as much as I'd love to have her in the studio for a live interview. Maybe one day...
saff: meh
Well, uhh… I think that wraps up this little segment. Thank you for joining us today, you two. Keep shining, and thank you so much for the art!
GUMMY: YEAH!!! EVERYONE LOOK OUT 4 THE RELEASE OF MY AWESOME SLICE OF LIFE SERIES GUMMYS GRAND TALES COMING SOON TO-
< CHATBOT SYSTEM DISABLED >
[Psst… no offense to them, but... not sure if I want to try interviewing kids again.]
[Hey, they were very nice though.]
[Even that Saff kid?]
[Umm… she’s a little strange… but…]
Eheh, anyways, onto the next segment of our stream!
